mapper.insert: insert into task_management (task_title, task_source, task_description, task_status, task_reporter, task_executor, create_date, update_date) values (#{taskTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskReporter,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{taskExecutor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update task_management set task_title = #{taskTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_source = #{taskSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_description = #{taskDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_status = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_reporter = #{taskReporter,jdbcType=BIGINT}, task_executor = #{taskExecutor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select task_id, task_title, task_source, task_description, task_status, task_reporter, task_executor, create_date, update_date from task_management where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select task_id, task_title, task_source, task_description, task_status, task_reporter, task_executor, create_date, update_date from task_management
